trans-unit.source: Replaces the GtkAdjustment associated with spin_button .
trans-unit.target: 替换与 spin_button 关联的GtkAdjustment。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the widget packed into the tooltip with custom_widget . custom_widget does not get destroyed when the tooltip goes away. By default a box with a GtkImage and GtkLabel is embedded in the tooltip, which can be configured using gtk_tooltip_set_markup() and gtk_tooltip_set_icon().
trans-unit.target: 用 custom_widget 替换包装在工具提示中的小部件。当工具提示消失时， custom_widget 不会被销毁。默认情况下，工具提示中会嵌入一个带有GtkImage和GtkLabel的框，可以使用 gtk_tooltip_set_markup() 和 gtk_tooltip_set_icon() 对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the natural height of the child will be calculated and propagated through the scrolled window’s requested natural height.
trans-unit.target: 报告是否将计算并通过滚动窗口请求的自然高度传播孩子的自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Reports whether the natural width of the child will be calculated and propagated through the scrolled window’s requested natural width.
trans-unit.target: 报告是否将计算子级的自然宽度，并通过滚动窗口请求的自然宽度进行传播。

trans-unit.source: Represents a downward pointing arrow.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个向下的箭头。

trans-unit.source: Represents a left pointing arrow.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个左指向的箭头。

trans-unit.source: Represents a request of a screen object in a given orientation. These are primarily used in container implementations when allocating a natural size for children calling. See gtk_distribute_natural_allocation().
trans-unit.target: 代表屏幕对象在给定方向上的请求。当为子调用分配自然大小时，它们主要用于容器实现中。参见 gtk_distribute_natural_allocation() 。

trans-unit.source: Represents a right pointing arrow.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个直指的箭头。

trans-unit.source: Represents a value within a known range
trans-unit.target: 代表已知范围内的数值

trans-unit.source: Represents an upward pointing arrow.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个向上的箭头。

trans-unit.source: Represents the orientation of widgets and other objects which can be switched between horizontal and vertical orientation on the fly, like GtkBox or GtkGesturePan.
trans-unit.target: 表示窗口小部件和其他对象的方向，这些对象可以在水平和垂直方向之间即时切换，例如GtkBox或GtkGesturePan。

trans-unit.source: Represents the packing location of a children in its parent. See GtkWindowControls for example.
trans-unit.target: 表示子项在其父项中的打包位置。例如，请参见GtkWindowControls。

trans-unit.source: Request that the input method should not update personalized data (like typing history)
trans-unit.target: 要求输入法不更新个性化数据(如输入历史)。

trans-unit.source: Request the widget to be rendered partially transparent, with opacity 0 being fully transparent and 1 fully opaque. (Opacity values are clamped to the [0,1] range).
trans-unit.target: 请求将 widget 呈现为部分透明，不透明度0为完全透明，而1为完全不透明。（不透明度值固定在[0,1]范围内）。

trans-unit.source: Requesting area sizes
trans-unit.target: 要求的面积大小

trans-unit.source: Requesting the height for width (or width for height) of an area is a similar task except in this case the GtkCellAreaContext does not store the data (actually, it does not know how much space the layouting widget plans to allocate it for every row. It’s up to the layouting widget to render each row of data with the appropriate height and width which was requested by the GtkCellArea).
trans-unit.target: 请求区域的宽度的高度（或宽度的高度）是一个类似的任务，除了在这种情况下，GtkCellAreaContext不存储数据（实际上，它不知道布局小部件计划为每行分配多少空间）。取决于布局小部件，以GtkCellArea要求的适当高度和宽度来呈现每一行数据。

trans-unit.source: Requests a completion operation, or in other words a refiltering of the current list with completions, using the current key. The completion list view will be updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 请求完成操作,或者换句话说,使用当前的键对当前的完成列表进行重新过滤。完成列表视图将相应地更新。

trans-unit.source: Requests a prefix insertion.
trans-unit.target: 请求插入前缀。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the selection state of all positions set in mask be updated to the respective value in the selected bitmask.
trans-unit.target: 请求将 mask 设置的所有位置的选择状态更新为 selected 位掩码中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: Requests that the window is closed, similar to what happens when a window manager close button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 请求关闭窗口,类似于点击窗口管理器关闭按钮时的情况。

trans-unit.source: Requests the printer details. When the details are available, the “details-acquired” signal will be emitted on printer .
trans-unit.target: 请求打印机详细信息。当详细信息可用时，“详细信息已获取”信号将在 printer 上发出。

trans-unit.source: Requests to select a range of items in the model.
trans-unit.target: 请求选择模型中的项目范围。

trans-unit.source: Requests to select all items in the model.
trans-unit.target: 要求选择模型中的所有项目。

trans-unit.source: Requests to select an item in the model.
trans-unit.target: 请求在模型中选择一个项目。

trans-unit.source: Requests to unselect a range of items in the model.
trans-unit.target: 请求取消选择模型中的一系列项目。

trans-unit.source: Requests to unselect all items in the model.
trans-unit.target: 请求取消选择模型中的所有项目。

trans-unit.source: Requests to unselect an item in the model.
trans-unit.target: 请求取消选择模型中的一个项目。

trans-unit.source: Requires the length of the search key for completion to be at least length . This is useful for long lists, where completing using a small key takes a lot of time and will come up with meaningless results anyway (ie, a too large dataset).
trans-unit.target: 需要搜索键的长度 completion 至少为 length 。这对于长列表很有用，在长列表中，使用小键完成将花费大量时间，并且无论如何都会得出毫无意义的结果（即，太大的数据集）。

trans-unit.source: Reset the input method context of the entry if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要的话,可以重置该条目的输入法上下文。

trans-unit.source: Reset the input method context of the text view if needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要的话,可以重置文本视图的输入法上下文。

trans-unit.source: Resets a given media stream implementation. gtk_media_stream_prepared() can now be called again.
trans-unit.target: 重置给定的媒体流实现。现在可以再次调用 gtk_media_stream_prepared() 。

trans-unit.source: Resets any previously cached request and allocation data.
trans-unit.target: 重置任何先前缓存的请求和分配数据。

trans-unit.source: Resets the controller to a clean state. Every interaction the controller did through gtk_event_controller_handle_event() will be dropped at this point.
trans-unit.target: 将 controller 重置为干净状态。控制器通过 gtk_event_controller_handle_event() 进行的每个交互都将在此时删除。

trans-unit.source: Resets the accessible property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 将可访问 property 重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Resets the accessible relation to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 将可访问 relation 重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Resets the accessible state to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 将可访问 state 重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Resets the image to be empty.
trans-unit.target: 将图像重置为空。

trans-unit.source: Resets the media file to be empty.
trans-unit.target: 将媒体文件重置为空。

trans-unit.source: Resize mode of the column.
trans-unit.target: 调整列的大小模式。

trans-unit.source: Resizes all columns to their optimal width. Only works after the treeview has been realized.
trans-unit.target: 将所有列调整到最佳宽度。只有在树形视图实现后才有效。

trans-unit.source: Resolution for Xft, in 1024 * dots/inch. -1 to use default value.
trans-unit.target: Xft的分辨率,单位为1024*点/英寸。使用默认值为-1。

trans-unit.source: Resource paths that will be looked at when looking for icons, similar to search paths.
trans-unit.target: 寻找图标时将会查看的资源路径,类似于搜索路径。

trans-unit.source: Response Codes
trans-unit.target: 响应代码

trans-unit.source: Restores context state to a previous stage. See gtk_style_context_save().
trans-unit.target: 将 context 状态恢复到上一个阶段。参见 gtk_style_context_save() 。

trans-unit.source: Restores snapshot to the state saved by a preceding call to gtk_snapshot_save() and removes that state from the stack of saved states.
trans-unit.target: 将 snapshot 恢复到先前调用 gtk_snapshot_save() 所保存的状态，并从已保存状态的堆栈中删除该状态。

trans-unit.source: Result of a comparison function
trans-unit.target: 比较函数的结果

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the current preedit string for the input context, and a list of attributes to apply to the string. This string should be displayed inserted at the insertion point.
trans-unit.target: 检索当前输入上下文的预编辑字符串,以及要应用到该字符串的属性列表。这个字符串应该显示在插入点上。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the hard margins of printer , i.e. the margins that define the area at the borders of the paper that the printer cannot print to.
trans-unit.target: 检索 printer 的硬边距，即定义打印机无法打印到的纸张边框区域的边距。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the hard margins of printer for paper_size , i.e. the margins that define the area at the borders of the paper that the printer cannot print to.
trans-unit.target: 为 paper_size 检索 printer 的硬边距，即用于定义打印机无法打印到的纸张边界区域的边距。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a GtkLayoutChild instance for the GtkLayoutManager, creating one if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 检索GtkLayoutChild实例为GtkLayoutManager，创建一个如果需要的话。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cell area’s initial minimum and natural height.
trans-unit.target: 检索像元区域的初始最小和自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cell area’s initial minimum and natural width.
trans-unit.target: 检索像元区域的初始最小宽度和自然宽度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cell area’s minimum and natural height if it would be given the specified width .
trans-unit.target: 如果给定指定的 width ,则检索单元格区域的最小和自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cell area’s minimum and natural width if it would be given the specified height .
trans-unit.target: 如果给定指定的 height ,则检索单元格区域的最小和自然宽度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cell renderers’s minimum and natural height if it were rendered to widget with the specified width .
trans-unit.target: 如果以指定的 width 渲染到 widget ，则检索单元格渲染器的最小和自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cell renderers’s minimum and natural width if it were rendered to widget with the specified height .
trans-unit.target: 检索单元格渲染器的最小和自然宽度（如果已渲染到具有指定 height 的 widget 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a renderer’s natural size when rendered to widget .
trans-unit.target: 检索渲染到 widget 时渲染器的自然大小。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a sequence of characters. The characters that are retrieved are those characters at positions from start_pos up to, but not including end_pos . If end_pos is negative, then the characters retrieved are those characters from start_pos to the end of the text.
trans-unit.target: 检索字符序列。检索到的字符是从 start_pos 到但不包括 end_pos 的位置处的那些字符。如果 end_pos 为负，则检索到的字符是从 start_pos 到文本结尾的那些字符。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves context around the insertion point. Input methods typically want context in order to constrain input text based on existing text; this is important for languages such as Thai where only some sequences of characters are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 检索插入点周围的上下文。输入法通常需要上下文,以便根据现有的文本来限制输入文本;这对于泰语等只允许某些字符序列的语言来说非常重要。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the “visited” state of the URI where the GtkLinkButton points. The button becomes visited when it is clicked. If the URI is changed on the button, the “visited” state is unset again.
trans-unit.target: 检索GtkLinkBut​​ton指向的URI的“已访问”状态。单击该按钮后，该按钮将被访问。如果按钮上的URI更改，则“访问”状态将再次取消设置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkAccessible using this context.
trans-unit.target: 使用此上下文检索GtkAccessible。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkAccessibleRole for the given GtkAccessible.
trans-unit.target: 检索GtkAccessibleRole对于给定GtkAccessible。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkAdjustment used for horizontal scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于水平滚动的GtkAdjustment。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkAdjustment used for vertical scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于垂直滚动的GtkAdjustment。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkConstraintTarget used as the source for constraint .
trans-unit.target: 检索用作 constraint 源的GtkConstraintTarget。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkConstraintTarget used as the target for constraint .
trans-unit.target: 检索用作 constraint 目标的GtkConstraintTarget。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkExpression stored inside the given value , and acquires a reference to it.
trans-unit.target: 检索存储在给定 value 内的GtkExpression，并获取对其的引用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkExpression stored inside the given value .
trans-unit.target: 检索存储在给定 value 内的GtkExpression。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkLayoutManager instance that created the given layout_child .
trans-unit.target: 检索创建给定 layout_child 的GtkLayoutManager实例。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkWidget associated to the given layout_child .
trans-unit.target: 检索与给定 layout_child 关联的GtkWidget。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GtkWidget using the given GtkLayoutManager.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的GtkLayoutManager检索GtkWidget。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GdkGLContext used by area .
trans-unit.target: 检索GdkGLContext使用 area 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GdkPaintable used for the icon.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于图标的GdkPaintable。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the GIcon used for the icon, or NULL if there is no icon or if the icon was set by some other method (e.g., by paintable or icon name).
trans-unit.target: 检索用于图标的GIcon，如果没有图标或通过其他方法（例如，通过可绘制的或图标名称）设置了图标，则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the URI set using gtk_link_button_set_uri().
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_link_button_set_uri() 检索URI集。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the X alignment of the frame’s label. See gtk_frame_set_label_align().
trans-unit.target: 检索框架标签的X对齐方式。请参阅 gtk_frame_set_label_align() 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the accessible role of this context.
trans-unit.target: 检索此上下文的可访问角色。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the accessible role used by the given GtkWidget class.
trans-unit.target: 检索给定GtkWidget类使用的可访问角色。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the attribute of the source to be read by the constraint .
trans-unit.target: 检索要由 constraint 读取的源的属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the attribute of the target to be set by the constraint .
trans-unit.target: 检索要由 constraint 设置的目标的属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the center bar widget of the bar.
trans-unit.target: 检索酒吧的中心栏小部件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the character displayed in place of the real characters for entries with visibility set to false. Note that GTK does not compute this value unless it needs it, so the value returned by this function is not very useful unless it has been explicitly set with gtk_text_set_invisible_char()
trans-unit.target: 检索可见性设置为false的条目中显示的代替实际字符的字符。请注意，GTK除非需要它，否则不会计算该值，因此，除非已使用 gtk_text_set_invisible_char() 对其进行了显式设置，否则此函数返回的值不是很有用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the character displayed in place of the real characters for entries with visibility set to false. See gtk_entry_set_invisible_char().
trans-unit.target: 检索可见性设置为false的条目中显示的代替实际字符的字符。参见 gtk_entry_set_invisible_char() 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the column number to which child attaches its left side.
trans-unit.target: 检索 child 左侧附加的列号。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the constant factor added to the source attributes' value.
trans-unit.target: 检索加在源属性值上的常数因子。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the contents of editable . The returned string is owned by GTK and must not be modified or freed.
trans-unit.target: 检索 editable 的内容。返回的字符串归GTK所有，不得修改或释放。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the contents of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 检索缓冲区的内容。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the contents of the label in GtkStatusbar.
trans-unit.target: 检索GtkStatusbar中标签的内容。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current accelerator of self .
trans-unit.target: 检索当前的 self 加速器。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current focused widget within the root.
trans-unit.target: 检索根目录下的当前焦点小组件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current focused widget within the window. Note that this is the widget that would have the focus if the toplevel window focused; if the toplevel window is not focused then gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) will not be TRUE for the widget.
trans-unit.target: 检索窗口中当前的焦点窗口小部件。请注意，如果顶层窗口聚焦，则这是具有焦点的小部件；如果顶级窗口未聚焦，则该窗口 gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) 不会为 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current fullscreen state of window .
trans-unit.target: 检索 window 的当前全屏状态。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current length of the text in entry .
trans-unit.target: 检索 entry 中文本的当前长度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current length of the text in self .
trans-unit.target: 检索 self 中文本的当前长度。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current line number and the number of the character on that line. Intended for use in error messages; there are no strict semantics for what constitutes the "current" line number other than "the best number we could come up with for error messages."
trans-unit.target: 检索当前行号和该行上的字符编号。意在错误信息中使用;除了 "我们能想到的用于错误信息的最佳数字 "之外,对于什么是 "当前 "行号没有严格的语义。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current maximized state of window .
trans-unit.target: 检索 window 的当前最大化状态。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current policy values for the horizontal and vertical scrollbars. See gtk_scrolled_window_set_policy().
trans-unit.target: 检索水平和垂直滚动条的当前策略值。请参阅 gtk_scrolled_window_set_policy() 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current position of the cursor relative to the start of the content of the editable.
trans-unit.target: 读取光标相对于可编辑内容的起始位置的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the currently focused cell for area
trans-unit.target: 检索当前焦点单元 area

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the custom label text for the accept button.
trans-unit.target: 检索接受按钮的自定义标签文本。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the custom label text for the cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 检索取消按钮的自定义标签文本。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the desired maximum width of editable , in characters. See gtk_editable_set_max_width_chars().
trans-unit.target: 检索所需的 editable 最大宽度，以字符为单位。参见 gtk_editable_set_max_width_chars() 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the desired maximum width of label , in characters. See gtk_label_set_width_chars().
trans-unit.target: 检索 label 的所需最大宽度，以字符为单位。参见 gtk_label_set_width_chars() 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the desired width of label , in characters. See gtk_label_set_width_chars().
trans-unit.target: 检索 label 的所需宽度，以字符为单位。参见 gtk_label_set_width_chars() 。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the element stack from the internal state of the parser.
trans-unit.target: 从解析器的内部状态检索元素栈。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the end child of the given GtkPaned.
trans-unit.target: 检索给定GtkPaned的结束子级。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the first and last iterators in the buffer, i.e. the entire buffer lies within the range [start ,end ).
trans-unit.target: 检索缓冲区中的第一个和最后一个迭代器，即整个缓冲区位于[ start ， end ）范围内。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the icon associated to the resource MIME type.
trans-unit.target: 检索与资源MIME类型相关联的图标。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the icon name used for the icon, or NULL if there is no icon or if the icon was set by some other method (e.g., by paintable or gicon).
trans-unit.target: 检索用于该图标，或图标名称 NULL 如果没有图标，或者如果图标被一些其他方法来设定（例如，由上漆或GICON）。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the internal scale factor that maps from window coordinates to the actual device pixels. On traditional systems this is 1, on high density outputs, it can be a higher value (typically 2).
trans-unit.target: 检索从窗口坐标映射到实际设备像素的内部比例系数。在传统系统中,这个值是1,在高密度输出中,它可以是一个更高的值(通常是2)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the iterator at buffer coordinates x and y . Buffer coordinates are coordinates for the entire buffer, not just the currently-displayed portion. If you have coordinates from an event, you have to convert those to buffer coordinates with gtk_text_view_window_to_buffer_coords().
trans-unit.target: 在缓冲区坐标 x 和 y 处检索迭代器。缓冲区坐标是整个缓冲区的坐标，而不仅仅是当前显示的部分。如果您有事件的坐标，则必须使用 gtk_text_view_window_to_buffer_coords() 将其转换为缓冲区坐标。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the iterator pointing to the character at buffer coordinates x and y . Buffer coordinates are coordinates for the entire buffer, not just the currently-displayed portion. If you have coordinates from an event, you have to convert those to buffer coordinates with gtk_text_view_window_to_buffer_coords().
trans-unit.target: 检索指向缓冲区坐标 x 和 y 处的字符的迭代器。缓冲区坐标是整个缓冲区的坐标，而不仅仅是当前显示的部分。如果您有事件的坐标，则必须使用 gtk_text_view_window_to_buffer_coords() 将其转换为缓冲区坐标。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the label widget for the frame. See gtk_expander_set_label_widget().

trans-unit.source: Return: TRUE to stop other handlers from being invoked for the signal

trans-unit.source: Returned if an action widget has no response id, or if the dialog gets programmatically hidden or destroyed
trans-unit.target: 如果一个动作部件没有响应ID,或者对话框被程序性地隐藏或销毁,则返回。

trans-unit.source: Returned if the dialog is deleted
trans-unit.target: 如果对话框被删除,则返回。

trans-unit.source: Returned values with type G_TYPE_OBJECT have to be unreferenced, values with type G_TYPE_STRING or G_TYPE_BOXED have to be freed. Other values are passed by value.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型为 G_TYPE_OBJECT 的值必须是未引用的，类型为 G_TYPE_STRING 或 G_TYPE_BOXED 的值必须被释放。其他值按值传递。

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Returns

trans-unit.source: Returns (transfer full): the current icon theme name,
trans-unit.target: 返回(转满):当前图标主题名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if context currently has defined the given class name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 context 当前已定义给定的类名，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if descendant is a descendant of path .
trans-unit.target: 如果 descendant 是 path 的后代，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if gesture is currently handling events corresponding to sequence .
trans-unit.target: 如果 gesture 当前正在处理与 sequence 对应的事件，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter begins a paragraph, i.e. if gtk_text_iter_get_line_offset() would return 0. However this function is potentially more efficient than gtk_text_iter_get_line_offset() because it doesn’t have to compute the offset, it just has to see whether it’s 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 开始一个段落，则返回 TRUE ，即 gtk_text_iter_get_line_offset() 返回0。但是，此函数可能比 gtk_text_iter_get_line_offset() 更有效，因为它不必计算偏移量，只需查看它是否为0。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter has children, FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 有子级，则返回 TRUE ，否则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter is an ancestor of descendant . That is, iter is the parent (or grandparent or great-grandparent) of descendant .
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 是 descendant 的祖先，则返回 TRUE 。也就是说， iter 是 descendant 的父母（或祖父母或曾祖父母）。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter is the end iterator, i.e. one past the last dereferenceable iterator in the buffer. gtk_text_iter_is_end() is the most efficient way to check whether an iterator is the end iterator.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 是结束迭代器，即在缓冲区中最后一个可取消引用的迭代器之后，则返回 TRUE 。 gtk_text_iter_is_end() 是检查迭代器是否为最终迭代器的最有效方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter is the first iterator in the buffer, that is if iter has a character offset of 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 是缓冲区中的第一个迭代器，即 iter 的字符偏移量为0 ，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter points to a character that is part of a range tagged with tag . See also gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() and gtk_text_iter_ends_tag().
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 指向一个用 tag 标记的范围内的字符，则返回 TRUE 。另请参见 gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() 和 gtk_text_iter_ends_tag() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if iter points to the start of the paragraph delimiter characters for a line (delimiters will be either a newline, a carriage return, a carriage return followed by a newline, or a Unicode paragraph separator character). Note that an iterator pointing to the \n of a \r\n pair will not be counted as the end of a line, the line ends before the \r. The end iterator is considered to be at the end of a line, even though there are no paragraph delimiter chars there.
trans-unit.target: 如果 iter 指向行的段落定界符的开头，则返回 TRUE （定界符将是换行符，回车符，后跟换行符的回车符或Unicode段落分隔符）。请注意，指向\ r \ n对的\ n的迭代器不会被视为行的结尾，而是在\ r之前结束。即使那里没有段落定界符char，结束迭代器也被认为是在行的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if path is a descendant of ancestor .
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 是 ancestor 的后代，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if self and other contain the same values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 self 和 other 包含相同的值，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if size is an IPP standard paper size.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 是IPP标准纸张尺寸，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if size is not a standard paper size.
trans-unit.target: 如果 size 不是标准纸张大小，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if tag is toggled off at exactly this point. If tag is NULL, returns TRUE if any tag is toggled off at this point.
trans-unit.target: 如果恰好在这一点关闭了 tag 则返回 TRUE 。如果 tag 为 NULL ，则如果此时已关闭任何标签，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if tag is toggled on at exactly this point. If tag is NULL, returns TRUE if any tag is toggled on at this point.
trans-unit.target: 如果恰好在这一点打开了 tag 则返回 TRUE 。如果 tag 为 NULL ，则如果此时已打开任何标签，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if tree_column is visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tree_column 是可见的，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if any of the cells packed into the tree_column are visible. For this to be meaningful, you must first initialize the cells with gtk_tree_view_column_cell_set_cell_data()
trans-unit.target: 如果打包到 tree_column 中的任何单元格都可见，则返回 TRUE 。为了使这一点有意义，您必须首先使用 gtk_tree_view_column_cell_set_cell_data() 初始化单元格

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if both gestures pertain to the same group.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个手势都属于同一组，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if inline-selection mode is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 如果内联选择模式已打开，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if some text is selected; places the bounds of the selection in start and end (if the selection has length 0, then start and end are filled in with the same value). start and end will be in ascending order. If start and end are NULL, then they are not filled in, but the return value still indicates whether text is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了某些文本，则返回 TRUE ;否则，返回TRUE。将选择的边界放置在 start 和 end （如果选择的长度为0，则 start 和 end 将使用相同的值填充）。 start 和 end 将按升序排列。如果 start 和 end 为NULL，则不会填充它们，但是返回值仍指示是否选择了文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the reference is non-NULL and refers to a current valid path.
trans-unit.target: 如果 reference 为非 NULL ,并且引用当前有效路径，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the tree_column can be reordered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以对 tree_column 进行重新排序，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the tree_column can be resized by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 如果最终用户可以调整 tree_column 的大小，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the children enumeration is currently in progress.
trans-unit.target: 如果子级枚举当前正在进行中，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the column expands to fill available space.
trans-unit.target: 如果列扩展为填充可用空间，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the files are currently being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在加载文件，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the gesture is currently active. A gesture is active meanwhile there are touch sequences interacting with it.
trans-unit.target: 如果手势当前处于活动状态，则返回 TRUE 。手势处于活动状态，同时有触摸序列与之交互。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the gesture is currently recognized. A gesture is recognized if there are as many interacting touch sequences as required by gesture .
trans-unit.target: 如果当前已识别手势，则返回 TRUE 。如果手势所需要的交互触摸序列的数量相同，则可以识别 gesture 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the gesture is only triggered by touch events.
trans-unit.target: 如果手势仅由触摸事件触发，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the headers on the tree_view are visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tree_view 上的标头可见，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the icon pointed to by path is currently selected. If path does not point to a valid location, FALSE is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前选择了 path 指向的图标，则返回 TRUE 。如果 path 未指向有效位置，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the mark has been removed from its buffer with gtk_text_buffer_delete_mark(). See gtk_text_buffer_add_mark() for a way to add it to a buffer again.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 gtk_text_buffer_delete_mark() 从其缓冲区中删除了标记，则返回 TRUE 。有关再次将其添加到缓冲区的方法，请参见 gtk_text_buffer_add_mark() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the mark is visible (i.e. a cursor is displayed for it).
trans-unit.target: 如果标记可见（即显示光标），则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the model has a default sort function. This is used primarily by GtkTreeViewColumns in order to determine if a model can go back to the default state, or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型具有默认的排序功能，则返回 TRUE 。这主要由GtkTreeViewColumns使用，以确定模型是否可以返回默认状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the node pointed to by path is expanded in tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 如果 path 指向的节点在 tree_view 中展开，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the row at iter is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前选中 iter 的行，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the row pointed to by path is currently selected. If path does not point to a valid location, FALSE is returned
trans-unit.target: 如果当前选择了 path 指向的行，则返回 TRUE 。如果 path 未指向有效位置，则返回 FALSE

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the user can click on the header for the column.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以单击列标题，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the version of the GTK header files is the same as or newer than the passed-in version.
trans-unit.target: 如果GTK头文件的版本与传入的版本相同或较新，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if videos have been set to loop via gtk_video_set_loop().
trans-unit.target: 如果已将视频设置为通过 gtk_video_set_loop() 循环播放，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE, if a value is associated with key .
trans-unit.target: 如果值与 key 关联，则返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GtkTreePath referring to the currently displayed row. If no row is currently displayed, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GtkTreePath引用当前显示的行。如果当前未显示任何行，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a PangoFontMap that is suitable for use with the GtkPrintContext.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个PangoFontMap是适用于使用GtkPrintContext。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GDateTime representing the shown year, month and the selected day, in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GDateTime,代表当地时区的年、月和选定的日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GList of all the GtkTreeViewColumn s currently in tree_view . The returned list must be freed with g_list_free().
trans-unit.target: 返回当前在 tree_view 中所有GtkTreeViewColumn的GList。必须使用 g_list_free() 释放返回的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GListModel that contains the pages of the notebook, and can be used to keep an up-to-date view.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含笔记本页面的GListModel,并可用于保持最新的视图。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GListModel that contains the pages of the stack, and can be used to keep an up-to-date view. The model also implements GtkSelectionModel and can be used to track and modify the visible page.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GListModel，它包含堆栈的页面，可用于保持最新视图。该模型还实现了GtkSelectionModel，可用于跟踪和修改可见页面。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GListModel to track the GtkEventControllers of widget .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GListModel跟踪GtkEventControllers的 widget 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GListModel to track the children of widget .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GListModel来跟踪 widget 的子级。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GListModel to track the constraints that are part of layout .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GListModel来跟踪属于 layout 的约束。

trans-unit.source: Returns a GListModel to track the guides that are part of layout .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个GListModel来跟踪属于 layout 的辅助线。

trans-unit.source: Returns a description of the location of the printer.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机位置的描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of GtkTextTag that are toggled on or off at this point. (If toggled_on is TRUE, the list contains tags that are toggled on.) If a tag is toggled on at iter , then some non-empty range of characters following iter has that tag applied to it. If a tag is toggled off, then some non-empty range following iter does not have the tag applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 返回此时已打开或关闭的GtkTextTag列表。（如果 toggled_on 是 TRUE ，该列表包含了关于切换的标记。）如果一个标签上在切换 iter ，然后字符的一些非空范围以下 iter 具有标签施加到其上。如果关闭了标签，则 iter 之后的一些非空范围将没有应用标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all GtkTextMark at this location. Because marks are not iterable (they don’t take up any "space" in the buffer, they are just marks in between iterable locations), multiple marks can exist in the same place. The returned list is not in any meaningful order.
trans-unit.target: 返回此位置的所有GtkTextMark的列表。因为标记是不可迭代的（它们不占用缓冲区中的任何“空格”，它们只是可迭代位置之间的标记），所以同一位置可以存在多个标记。返回的列表没有任何有意义的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all existing toplevel windows.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有现有toplevel窗口的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all existing toplevel windows. The widgets in the list are not individually referenced. If you want to iterate through the list and perform actions involving callbacks that might destroy the widgets, you must call g_list_foreach (result, (GFunc)g_object_ref, NULL) first, and then unref all the widgets afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有现有顶级窗口的列表。列表中的小部件未单独引用。如果要遍历列表并执行涉及可能破坏小部件的回调的操作，则必须先调用 g_list_foreach (result, (GFunc)g_object_ref, NULL) ，然后再取消对所有小部件的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tags that apply to iter , in ascending order of priority (highest-priority tags are last). The GtkTextTag in the list don’t have a reference added, but you have to free the list itself.
trans-unit.target: 以优先级升序返回适用于 iter 的标签列表（最高优先级标签在后）。列表中的GtkTextTag没有添加引用，但是您必须释放列表本身。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the GtkWindows that belong to window_group .
trans-unit.target: 返回属于 window_group 的GtkWindows的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new cell renderer which will show a spinner to indicate activity.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的单元格渲染器,它将显示一个微调器来指示活动。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new context identifier, given a description of the actual context. Note that the description is not shown in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的上下文标识符,给定一个实际上下文的描述。请注意,该描述不会显示在用户界面中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new spinner widget. Not yet started.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的spinner部件。尚未开始。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly allocated list of the widgets, normally labels, for which this widget is the target of a mnemonic (see for example, gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget()).
trans-unit.target: 返回新分配的微件列表，通常是标签，该微件是助记符的目标（例如，参见 gtk_label_set_mnemonic_widget() ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkCssProvider.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新创建的GtkCssProvider。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes 2-touch rotation gestures.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新创建的GtkGesture，该GtkGesture可以识别2触摸旋转手势。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes drags.
trans-unit.target: 返回识别阻力的新创建的GtkGesture。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes long presses.
trans-unit.target: 返回可以识别长按的新创建的GtkGesture。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes pan gestures.
trans-unit.target: 返回可识别平移手势的新创建的GtkGesture。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes single and multiple presses.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新创建的GtkGesture，该GtkGesture可以识别单按和多按。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes swipes.
trans-unit.target: 返回可识别刷卡的新创建的GtkGesture。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly created GtkGesture that recognizes zoom in/out gestures (usually known as pinch/zoom).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新创建的GtkGesture，该GtkGesture可以识别放大/缩小手势（通常称为收缩/缩放）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a newly-created GtkTreePath referenced by iter .
trans-unit.target: 返回由 iter 引用的新创建的GtkTreePath。

trans-unit.source: Returns a paintable encapsulating the render node that was constructed by snapshot . After calling this function, it is no longer possible to add more nodes to snapshot . The only function that should be called after this is g_object_unref().
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可绘制的图像，其中封装了由 snapshot 构造的渲染节点。调用此函数后，将无法再向 snapshot 添加更多节点。此后唯一应调用的函数是 g_object_unref() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a paintable for the node that was constructed by snapshot and frees snapshot .
trans-unit.target: 返回 snapshot 创建的节点的可绘制对象，并释放 snapshot 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a path that the row reference currently points to, or NULL if the path pointed to is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 返回行引用当前指向的路径；如果指向的路径不再有效，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the child model of filter .
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向 filter 的子模型的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of flags supported by this interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回该接口支持的一组标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns a special sorter that reflects the users sorting choices in the column view.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个特殊的分拣器,它反映了用户在列视图中的排序选择。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the status of the print operation. The string is translated and suitable for displaying the print status e.g. in a GtkStatusbar.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印操作状态的字符串表示形式。该字符串经过翻译，适合在GtkStatusbar中显示打印状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns all cell properties of a cell area class.
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格区域类的所有单元格属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns all gestures in the group of gesture
trans-unit.target: 返回所有手势组的 gesture

trans-unit.source: Returns all groups registered for the recently used item info . The array of returned group names will be NULL terminated, so length might optionally be NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回为最近使用的商品 info 注册的所有组。返回的组名数组将以 NULL 终止，因此length可以选择为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of integers describing the sizes at which the icon is available without scaling. A size of -1 means that the icon is available in a scalable format. The array is zero-terminated.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数数组,该数组描述了图标在没有缩放的情况下的尺寸。大小为-1表示图标是可缩放的格式。数组以零结尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns an internal child of a buildable. GtkDialog implements this to give access to its vbox , making it possible to add children to the vbox in a UI definition. Implement this if the buildable has internal children that may need to be accessed from a UI definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回可构建项的内部子项。GtkDialog实现了此功能以提供对其 vbox 的访问权限，从而可以在UI定义中向vbox添加子级。如果可构建项具有可能需要从UI定义访问的内部子项，则实施此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns default page size of printer .
trans-unit.target: 返回 printer 默认页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns if the day of the calendar is already marked.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回 day 的的 calendar 已标记。

trans-unit.source: Returns line wrap mode used by the label. See gtk_label_set_wrap_mode().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签使用的换行模式。参见 gtk_label_set_wrap_mode() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns text in the given range. If the range contains non-text elements such as images, the character and byte offsets in the returned string will not correspond to character and byte offsets in the buffer. If you want offsets to correspond, see gtk_text_iter_get_slice().
trans-unit.target: 返回给定范围内的文本。如果范围包含非文本元素（例如图像），则返回的字符串中的字符和字节偏移将不对应于缓冲区中的字符和字节偏移。如果您希望偏移量相对应，请参见 gtk_text_iter_get_slice() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkAppChooserWidget of this dialog.
trans-unit.target: 返回此对话框的GtkAppChooserWidget。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkApplicationWindow with the given ID.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有给定ID的GtkApplicationWindow。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkAssistantPage object for child .
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkAssistantPage为对象 child 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkEntry which is currently in use as interactive search entry for tree_view . In case the built-in entry is being used, NULL will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkEntry中这是目前用作交互式搜索条目 tree_view 。如果使用内置条目，则将返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkNotebookPage for child .
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkNotebookPage的 child 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkPopover that pops out of the button. If the button is not using a GtkPopover, this function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 返回从按钮弹出的GtkPopover。如果按钮未使用GtkPopover，则此函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkRoot widget of widget or NULL if the widget is not contained inside a widget tree with a root widget.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkRoot的小部件 widget 或 NULL ，如果小部件不包含有根小部件的控件树中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkStackPage object for child .
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkStackPage为对象 child 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkTextBuffer being displayed by this text view. The reference count on the buffer is not incremented; the caller of this function won’t own a new reference.
trans-unit.target: 返回此文本视图显示的GtkTextBuffer。缓冲区上的引用计数不增加；此函数的调用者将不会拥有新的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkTextBuffer this iterator is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 返回与此迭代器关联的GtkTextBuffer。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkTreeModel which is acting as data source for combo_box .
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkTreeModel，它充当 combo_box 的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkTreeView wherein tree_column has been inserted. If column is currently not inserted in any tree view, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回其中已插入 tree_column 的GtkTreeView。如果当前未在任何树视图中插入 column ，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkWidget in the button on the column header. If a custom widget has not been set then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回列标题上的按钮中的GtkWidget。如果尚未设置自定义窗口小部件，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkWidget this controller relates to.
trans-unit.target: 返回与此控制器相关的GtkWidget。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cairo_font_options_t used for Pango rendering. When not set, the defaults font options for the GdkDisplay will be used.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于Pango渲染的cairo_font_options_t。未设置时，将使用GdkDisplay的默认字体选项。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GdkDeviceTool currently driving input through this gesture. This function must be called from either the “down”, “motion”, “up” or “proximity” signal handlers.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前通过此手势驱动输入的GdkDeviceTool。必须从“向下”，“运动”，“向上”或“接近”信号处理程序中调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GdkDisplay to which context is attached.
trans-unit.target: 返回附加了 context 的GdkDisplay。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GdkEventSequence that was last updated on gesture .
trans-unit.target: 返回GdkEventSequence是最后更新于 gesture 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the PangoLanguage for the default language currently in effect. (Note that this can change over the life of an application.) The default language is derived from the current locale. It determines, for example, whether GTK uses the right-to-left or left-to-right text direction.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前有效的默认语言的PangoLanguage。（请注意，这可能会在应用程序的整个生命周期内发生变化。）默认语言是从当前语言环境派生的。例如，它确定GTK是使用从右到左还是从左到右的文本方向。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sequence state, as seen by gesture .
trans-unit.target: 返回 sequence 状态下，所看到 gesture 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the CSS name that is used for self .
trans-unit.target: 返回用于 self 的CSS名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GMenuModel used to generate the popup.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于生成弹出窗口的GMenuModel。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GTK debug flags that are currently active.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前活动的GTK调试标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GtkNative widget that contains widget , or NULL if the widget is not contained inside a widget tree with a native ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 widget 的GtkNative小部件，如果该小部件不包含在具有原始祖先的小部件树中，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ID of the active row of combo_box . This value is taken from the active row and the column specified by the “id-column” property of combo_box (see gtk_combo_box_set_id_column()).
trans-unit.target: 返回 combo_box 的活动行的ID。此值取自 combo_box 的“ id-column”属性指定的活动行和列（请参见 gtk_combo_box_set_id_column() ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI for the currently active link in the label. The active link is the one under the mouse pointer or, in a selectable label, the link in which the text cursor is currently positioned.
trans-unit.target: 返回标签中当前活动链接的URI。活动链接是指鼠标指针下方的链接,或者在可选择的标签中,是指文本光标当前所在的链接。

trans-unit.source: Returns the acceleration rate for repeated changes.
trans-unit.target: 返回重复变化的加速率。

trans-unit.source: Returns the aligned height for the given width that context must store while collecting sizes for it’s rows.
trans-unit.target: 返回在收集行大小时上下文必须存储的给定宽度的对齐高度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the aligned width for the given height that context must store while collecting sizes for it’s rows.
trans-unit.target: 返回在收集行大小时上下文必须存储的给定高度的对齐宽度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of space between the columns of grid .
trans-unit.target: 返回 grid 的列之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of space between the rows of grid .
trans-unit.target: 返回 grid 的行之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of time (in milliseconds) that transitions between pages in stack will take.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 stack 页面之间进行转换所花费的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of time (in milliseconds) that transitions will take.
trans-unit.target: 返回转换所需的时间(以毫秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount, in pixels, of extra indentation for child levels in tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_view 中子级别的额外缩进量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the auxiliary completion object currently in use by entry .
trans-unit.target: 通过 entry 返回当前正在使用的辅助完成对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the backend of the printer.
trans-unit.target: Returns the backend of the printer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the baseline position of row as set by gtk_grid_set_row_baseline_position() or the default value GTK_BASELINE_POSITION_CENTER.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 gtk_grid_set_row_baseline_position() 或默认值 GTK_BASELINE_POSITION_CENTER 设置的 row 的基线位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the baseline position of row as set by gtk_grid_layout_set_row_baseline_position(), or the default value of GTK_BASELINE_POSITION_CENTER.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 gtk_grid_layout_set_row_baseline_position() 设置的 row 的基线位置，或 GTK_BASELINE_POSITION_CENTER 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the baseline position of the layout.
trans-unit.target: 返回布局的基线位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the baseline that has currently been allocated to widget . This function is intended to be used when implementing handlers for the GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() function, and when allocating child widgets in GtkWidgetClass.size_allocate().
trans-unit.target: 返回当前已分配给 widget 的基线。该功能的目的是为实现当解毒使用 GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() 函数，并在分配子控件时 GtkWidgetClass.size_allocate() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the binary age as passed to libtool when building the GTK library the process is running against. If libtool means nothing to you, don't worry about it.
trans-unit.target: 返回构建进程要针对其运行的GTK库时传递给 libtool 的二进制年龄。如果 libtool 对您没有任何意义，请不要担心。

trans-unit.source: Returns the boolean represented by the value that is associated with key .
trans-unit.target: 返回由与 key 关联的值表示的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the button number gesture listens for, or 0 if gesture reacts to any button press.
trans-unit.target: 返回 gesture 侦听的按钮号；如果 gesture 对任何按钮按下有反应，则返回0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the button number currently interacting with gesture , or 0 if there is none.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前与 gesture 交互的按钮编号，如果没有，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the button used in the treeview column header
trans-unit.target: 返回用于treeview列头的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Returns the byte index of the iterator, counting from the start of a newline-terminated line. Remember that GtkTextBuffer encodes text in UTF-8, and that characters can require a variable number of bytes to represent.
trans-unit.target: 返回迭代器的字节索引，从换行符结束的行的开头开始计数。请记住，GtkTextBuffer以UTF-8编码文本，并且字符可能需要可变数量的字节来表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cell renderer’s sensitivity.
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格渲染器的灵敏度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cell renderer’s visibility.
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格渲染器的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cell renderers which have been added to cell_layout .
trans-unit.target: 返回已添加到 cell_layout 中的单元格渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the center widget of the layout.
trans-unit.target: 返回布局的中心小部件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the character offset of an iterator. Each character in a GtkTextBuffer has an offset, starting with 0 for the first character in the buffer. Use gtk_text_buffer_get_iter_at_offset() to convert an offset back into an iterator.
trans-unit.target: 返回迭代器的字符偏移量。GtkTextBuffer中的每个字符都有一个偏移量，缓冲区中的第一个字符从0开始。使用 gtk_text_buffer_get_iter_at_offset() 将偏移量转换回迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the character offset of the iterator, counting from the start of a newline-terminated line. The first character on the line has offset 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回迭代器的字符偏移量,从新行结束的行开始计算。行上的第一个字符偏移量为0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the child to which page belongs.
trans-unit.target: 返回 page 所属的子级。

trans-unit.source: Returns the child widget contained in page number page_num .
trans-unit.target: 返回页面编号 page_num 中包含的子窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column in the model of completion to get strings from.
trans-unit.target: 返回 completion 模型中的列以从中获取字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column of icon_view ’s model which is being used for displaying tooltips on icon_view ’s rows.
trans-unit.target: 返回 icon_view 模型的列，该列用于在 icon_view 的行上显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column of tree_view ’s model which is being used for displaying tooltips on tree_view ’s rows.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_view 模型的列，该列用于在 tree_view 的行上显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column that is the current expander column, or NULL if none has been set. This column has the expander arrow drawn next to it.
trans-unit.target: 返回作为当前扩展器列的列；如果未设置任何列，则返回 NULL 。该列旁边有扩展箭头。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column which combo_box is using to get string IDs for values from.
trans-unit.target: 返回 combo_box 用于获取值的字符串ID的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column which combo_box is using to get the strings from to display in the internal entry.
trans-unit.target: 返回 combo_box 用于获取字符串以显示在内部条目中的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column with markup text for icon_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回带有 icon_view 的标记文本的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column with pixbufs for icon_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回与pixbufs为列 icon_view 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the column with text for icon_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回带有 icon_view 文本的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the comments string.
trans-unit.target: 返回注释字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the compare function currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前使用的比较函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content area of dialog .
trans-unit.target: 返回 dialog 的内容区域。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content height of the widget, as passed to its size-allocate implementation. This is the size you should be using in GtkWidgetClass.snapshot(). For pointer events, see gtk_widget_contains().
trans-unit.target: 返回传递到其大小分配实现的小部件的内容高度。这是您应该在GtkWidgetClass.snapshot（）中使用的大小。有关指针事件，请参见 gtk_widget_contains() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content width of the widget, as passed to its size-allocate implementation. This is the size you should be using in GtkWidgetClass.snapshot(). For pointer events, see gtk_widget_contains().
trans-unit.target: 返回传递到其大小分配实现的小部件的内容宽度。这是您应该在GtkWidgetClass.snapshot（）中使用的大小。有关指针事件，请参见 gtk_widget_contains() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content width or height of the widget, depending on orientation . This is equivalent to calling gtk_widget_get_width() for GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL or gtk_widget_get_height() for GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL, but can be used when writing orientation-independent code, such as when implementing GtkOrientable widgets.
trans-unit.target: 根据 orientation 返回小部件的内容宽度或高度。这等同于调用 gtk_widget_get_width() 为 GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL 或 gtk_widget_get_height() 为 GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL ，但可写取向无关的代码时，例如当执行如使用GtkOrientable部件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the copyright string.
trans-unit.target: 返回版权字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current X offset of tree_column in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_column 的当前X偏移量（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current depth of path .
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 path 的深度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current focus child of widget .
trans-unit.target: 返回 widget 的当前焦点子级。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current fraction of the task that’s been completed.
trans-unit.target: 返回已完成任务的当前分数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current fraction of the task that’s been completed. See gtk_entry_set_progress_fraction().
trans-unit.target: 返回已完成任务的当前分数。请参阅 gtk_entry_set_progress_fraction() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current header of the row . This can be used in a GtkListBoxUpdateHeaderFunc to see if there is a header set already, and if so to update the state of it.
trans-unit.target: 返回该 row 的当前标题。可以在GtkListBoxUpdateHeaderFunc中使用它来查看是否已经设置了标头，如果有则更新标头的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current indices of path .
trans-unit.target: 返回 path 的当前索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current level of granularity for selecting fonts.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前选择字体的粒度水平。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current presentation timestamp in microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 以微秒为单位返回当前的显示时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current print settings.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的打印设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current row separator function.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的行分隔符函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current selection function.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的选择功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current size of tree_column in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_column 的当前大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current type of tree_column .
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_column 的当前类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value for the requested axis .
trans-unit.target: 返回请求 axis 的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “content-type” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ content-type”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-default-item” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ show-default-item”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-dialog-item” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ show-dialog-item”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-all” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“显示全部”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-default” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ show-default”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-fallback” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ show-fallback”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-other” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ show-other”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “show-recommended” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ show-recommended”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “active” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“活动”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “use-underline” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ use-underline”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “icon-name” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ icon-name”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “name” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“名称”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “needs-attention” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“需求注意”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “title” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ title”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the “use-underline” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回“ use-underline”属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current value of the has-tooltip property. See “has-tooltip” for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回has-tooltip属性的当前值。有关更多信息，请参见“具有工具提示”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current values for the requested axes . This function must be called from either the “down”, “motion”, “up” or “proximity” signals.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求 axes 的当前值。必须从“向下”，“运动”，“向上”或“接近”信号中调用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current x alignment of tree_column . This value can range between 0.0 and 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_column 的当前x对齐方式。此值的范围在0.0到1.0之间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently active string in combo_box , or NULL if none is selected. If combo_box contains an entry, this function will return its contents (which will not necessarily be an item from the list).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前活动的串 combo_box ，或 NULL 如果选择了没有。如果 combo_box 包含一个条目，则此函数将返回其内容（不一定是列表中的一项）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently selected application.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前选择的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom titlebar that has been set with gtk_window_set_titlebar().
trans-unit.target: 返回已使用 gtk_window_set_titlebar() 设置的自定义标题栏。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default editability of the GtkTextView. Tags in the buffer may override this setting for some ranges of text.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkTextView的默认可编辑性。对于某些范围的文本，缓冲区中的标记可能会覆盖此设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default page setup, see gtk_print_operation_set_default_page_setup().
trans-unit.target: 返回默认页面设置，请参阅 gtk_print_operation_set_default_page_setup() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default widget for window .
trans-unit.target: 返回 window 的默认小部件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the delay factor as set by gtk_gesture_long_press_set_delay_factor().
trans-unit.target: 返回由 gtk_gesture_long_press_set_delay_factor() 设置的延迟因子。

trans-unit.source: Returns the depth of iter . This will be 0 for anything on the root level, 1 for anything down a level, etc.
trans-unit.target: 返回 iter 的深度。对于根级别的任何内容，此值为0；对于级别较低的任何内容，此值为1，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Returns the desired aspect ratio of the child.
trans-unit.target: 返回孩子的长宽比。

trans-unit.source: Returns the device of the event that is currently being handled by the controller, and NULL otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回控制器当前正在处理的事件的设备，否则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the direction the popup will be pointing at when popped up.
trans-unit.target: 返回弹出时,弹出窗口将指向的方向。

trans-unit.source: Returns the display that the GtkIconTheme object was created for.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkIconTheme对象的显示效果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the display that this GtkRoot is on.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个GtkRoot的显示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the double value associated with key , or 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 key 关联的双精度值，或者为0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ellipsizing position of the label. See gtk_label_set_ellipsize().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签的省略号位置。参见 gtk_label_set_ellipsize() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the ellipsizing position of the progress bar. See gtk_progress_bar_set_ellipsize().
trans-unit.target: 返回进度条的省略号位置。参见 gtk_progress_bar_set_ellipsize() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the end widget of the layout.
trans-unit.target: 返回布局的结束部件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event sequence currently interacting with gesture . This is only meaningful if gtk_gesture_is_active() returns TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前与 gesture 交互的事件序列。仅当 gtk_gesture_is_active() 返回 TRUE 时,这才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event that is currently being handled by the controller, and NULL at other times.
trans-unit.target: 返回控制器当前正在处理的事件，其他时候返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fallback icon name for windows that has been set with gtk_window_set_default_icon_name(), or NULL if that function has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 返回已使用 gtk_window_set_default_icon_name() 设置的窗口的后备图标名称，如果尚未调用该函数，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the file that self is currently playing from.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前正在播放其 self 的文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the filename of the bookmark file that this list is loading.
trans-unit.target: 返回此列表正在加载的书签文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the floating point number represented by the value that is associated with key , or default_val if the value does not represent a floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 返回浮点数表示由与相关联的值 key ，或 default_val 如果该值不表示浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the group for window or the default group, if window is NULL or if window does not have an explicit window group.
trans-unit.target: 如果 window 为 NULL 或 window 没有显式窗口组，则返回 window 的组或默认组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the header bar of dialog . Note that the headerbar is only used by the dialog if the “use-header-bar” property is TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 返回 dialog 的标题栏。请注意，只有在“ use-header-bar”属性为 TRUE 时，对话框才会使用标题栏。

trans-unit.source: Returns the height that has currently been allocated to widget .
trans-unit.target: 返回当前已分配给 widget 的高度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the horizontal alignment of the child within the allocation of the GtkAspectFrame.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkAspectFrame分配中子级的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the horizontal scrollbar of scrolled_window .
trans-unit.target: 返回水平滚动条 scrolled_window 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the horizontal scrollbar’s adjustment, used to connect the horizontal scrollbar to the child widget’s horizontal scroll functionality.
trans-unit.target: 返回水平滚动条的调整，用于将水平滚动条连接到子小部件的水平滚动功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns the icon name displayed as logo in the about dialog.
trans-unit.target: 返回 "关于 "对话框中作为图标显示的图标名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the icon name set via gtk_button_set_icon_name().
trans-unit.target: 返回通过 gtk_button_set_icon_name() 设置的图标名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the currently active item, or -1 if there’s no active item. If the model is a non-flat treemodel, and the active item is not an immediate child of the root of the tree, this function returns gtk_tree_path_get_indices (path)[0], where path is the GtkTreePath of the active item.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前活动项目的索引；如果没有活动项目，则返回-1。如果模型是非平面树模型，并且活动项不是树根的直接子级，则此函数返回 gtk_tree_path_get_indices (path)[0] ，其中 path 是活动项的GtkTreePath。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the icon which is the source of the current DND operation, or -1.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前DND操作源图标的索引,或-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer value of key , or 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回 key 的整数值，或0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the interface age as passed to libtool when building the GTK library the process is running against. If libtool means nothing to you, don't worry about it.
trans-unit.target: 返回构建进程运行所针对的GTK库时传递给 libtool 的接口使用期限。如果 libtool 对您没有任何意义，请不要担心。

trans-unit.source: Returns the justification of the label. See gtk_label_set_justify().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签的对正。参见 gtk_label_set_justify() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label of the checkbutton.
trans-unit.target: 返回选中按钮的标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label used for the website link.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于网站链接的标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns the language in effect at iter .
trans-unit.target: 返回 iter 有效的语言。

trans-unit.source: Returns the largest value in self . If self is empty, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 中的最大值。如果 self 为空，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last event that was processed for sequence .
trans-unit.target: 返回为 sequence 处理的最后一个事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the license information.
trans-unit.target: 返回许可证信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line number containing the iterator. Lines in a GtkTextBuffer are numbered beginning with 0 for the first line in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含迭代器的行号。在一个线GtkTextBuffer编号开始与0为在缓冲器中的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of GdkEventSequences currently being interpreted by gesture .
trans-unit.target: 返回当前由 gesture 解释的GdkEventSequences列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of actions (possibly empty) that accel maps to. Each item in the list is a detailed action name in the usual form.
trans-unit.target: 返回 accel 映射到的动作列表（可能为空）。列表中的每个项目都是通常形式的详细操作名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of css classes applied to widget .
trans-unit.target: 返回应用于 widget 的css类的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of widgets associated with size_group .
trans-unit.target: 返回与 size_group 关联的小部件列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the CSS document where this section ends.
trans-unit.target: 返回CSS文档中本节结束的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the CSS document where this section starts.
trans-unit.target: 返回本节在CSS文档中的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical GdkDevice that is currently operating on gesture , or NULL if the gesture is not being interacted.
trans-unit.target: 返回逻辑GdkDevice当前的操作 gesture ，或 NULL 如果手势没有被相互作用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the major version number of the GTK library. (e.g. in GTK version 3.1.5 this is 3.)
trans-unit.target: 返回GTK库的主要版本号。(例如在GTK 3.1.5版本中是3。)

trans-unit.source: Returns the mark name; returns NULL for anonymous marks.
trans-unit.target: 返回标记名称;对于匿名标记返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mark named name in buffer buffer , or NULL if no such mark exists in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回缓冲区 buffer 名为 name 的标记，如果缓冲区中不存在这样的标记，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mark that represents the cursor (insertion point). Equivalent to calling gtk_text_buffer_get_mark() to get the mark named “insert”, but very slightly more efficient, and involves less typing.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示光标的标记（插入点）。等效于调用 gtk_text_buffer_get_mark() 以获取名为“ insert”的标记，但效率略高，并且涉及的打字次数更少。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mark that represents the selection bound. Equivalent to calling gtk_text_buffer_get_mark() to get the mark named “selection_bound”, but very slightly more efficient, and involves less typing.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示选择范围的标记。等效于调用 gtk_text_buffer_get_mark() 以获取名为“ selection_bound”的标记，但效率略高，并且涉及的键入次数更少。

trans-unit.source: Returns the match mode that the filter is using.
trans-unit.target: 返回过滤器正在使用的匹配模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum content height set.
trans-unit.target: 返回设置的最大内容高度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum content width set.
trans-unit.target: 返回设置的最大内容宽度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum width in pixels of the tree_column , or -1 if no maximum width is set.
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_column 的最大宽度（以像素为单位）；如果未设置最大宽度，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the menu model that has been set with gtk_application_set_menubar().

trans-unit.source: Returns the message area of the dialog. This is the box where the dialog’s primary and secondary labels are packed. You can add your own extra content to that box and it will appear below those labels. See gtk_dialog_get_content_area() for the corresponding function in the parent GtkDialog.
trans-unit.target: 返回对话框的消息区域。这是对话框的主要和辅助标签的包装盒。您可以在该框中添加自己的额外内容，该内容将显示在这些标签下方。有关父GtkDialog中的相应功能，请参见 gtk_dialog_get_content_area() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the micro version number of the GTK library. (e.g. in GTK version 3.1.5 this is 5.)

trans-unit.source: Returns the render node that was constructed by snapshot . After calling this function, it is no longer possible to add more nodes to snapshot . The only function that should be called after this is g_object_unref().

trans-unit.source: Returns the renderer that is used for this GtkNative.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于此GtkNative的渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the scale used for assets.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于资产的比例尺。

trans-unit.source: Returns the scrollbar's adjustment.

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of a non-scrolling border around the outside of the scrollable. An example for this would be treeview headers. GTK can use this information to display overlaid graphics, like the overshoot indication, at the right position.
trans-unit.target: 返回可滚动对象外部的非滚动边界的大小。这方面的一个例子是treeview headers.GTK可以使用这个信息在正确的位置显示重叠的图形,比如过冲指示.

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the table (number of tags)
trans-unit.target: 返回表格的大小(标签的数量)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest value in self . If self is empty, G_MAXUINT is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 中的最小值。如果 self 为空，则返回G_MAXUINT。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorter that is associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: 返回与该列相关联的分拣器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorter used by self .
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 使用的排序器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the space that box_layout puts between children.
trans-unit.target: 返回 box_layout 在子级之间放置的空间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the spacing of tree_column .
trans-unit.target: 返回 tree_column 的间距。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified kinetic scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的动态滚动行为。

trans-unit.target: Returns the start widget fo the layout.

trans-unit.target: 返回描述打印机当前状态的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state used for style matching.

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of the print operation. Also see gtk_print_operation_get_status_string().

trans-unit.source: Returns the style context associated to widget . The returned object is guaranteed to be the same for the lifetime of widget .

trans-unit.source: Returns the tab label widget for the page child . NULL is returned if child is not in notebook or if no tab label has specifically been set for child .
trans-unit.target: 返回页面 child 的选项卡标签小部件。如果 child 不在 notebook 或者没有为 child 专门设置选项卡标签，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text in the given range. A “slice” is an array of characters encoded in UTF-8 format, including the Unicode “unknown” character 0xFFFC for iterable non-character elements in the buffer, such as images. Because images are encoded in the slice, byte and character offsets in the returned array will correspond to byte offsets in the text buffer. Note that 0xFFFC can occur in normal text as well, so it is not a reliable indicator that a paintable or widget is in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定范围内的文本。“切片”是以UTF-8格式编码的字符数组，包括用于缓冲区中可迭代的非字符元素（例如图像）的Unicode“未知”字符0xFFFC。因为图像是在切片中编码的，所以返回数组中的字节和字符偏移量将与文本缓冲区中的字节偏移量相对应。请注意，0xFFFC也可以出现在普通文本中，因此这不是可靠的指示符，指出缓冲区中是否有可绘制的或控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text in the range [start ,end ). Excludes undisplayed text (text marked with tags that set the invisibility attribute) if include_hidden_chars is FALSE. Does not include characters representing embedded images, so byte and character indexes into the returned string do not correspond to byte and character indexes into the buffer. Contrast with gtk_text_buffer_get_slice().
trans-unit.target: 返回[ start ， end ）范围内的文本。如果 include_hidden_chars 为 FALSE ,则排除未显示的文本（用设置了invisibility属性的标记标记的文本）。不包含代表嵌入图像的字符，因此返回字符串中的字节和字符索引与缓冲区中的字节和字符索引不对应。与 gtk_text_buffer_get_slice() 对比。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text in the range [start ,end ). Excludes undisplayed text (text marked with tags that set the invisibility attribute) if include_hidden_chars is FALSE. The returned string includes a 0xFFFC character whenever the buffer contains embedded images, so byte and character indexes into the returned string do correspond to byte and character indexes into the buffer. Contrast with gtk_text_buffer_get_text(). Note that 0xFFFC can occur in normal text as well, so it is not a reliable indicator that a paintable or widget is in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回[ start ， end ）范围内的文本。如果 include_hidden_chars 为 FALSE ,则排除未显示的文本（用设置了invisibility属性的标记标记的文本）。每当缓冲区包含嵌入的图像时，返回的字符串都包含一个0xFFFC字符，因此返回的字符串中的字节和字符索引确实对应于缓冲区中的字节和字符索引。与 gtk_text_buffer_get_text() 对比。请注意，0xFFFC也可以出现在普通文本中，因此这不是可靠的指示符，指出缓冲区中是否有可绘制的或控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text that is shown if there are not applications that can handle the content type.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有能够处理内容类型的应用程序,则返回显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying GdkDrag object for an ongoing drag.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of key , interpreted as an integer, or the default value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 key 的值（解释为整数）或默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the GtkEventControllerMotion:is-pointer property.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value set via gtk_widget_set_overflow().

trans-unit.source: Returns the vertical alignment of the child within the allocation of the GtkAspectFrame.

trans-unit.target: 返回垂直滚动条的调整，用于将垂直滚动条连接到子小部件的垂直滚动功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the audio for the stream. See gtk_media_stream_set_volume() for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回流的音频音量。有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_media_stream_set_volume() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the website URL.
trans-unit.target: 返回网站的URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the widget state as a flag set. It is worth mentioning that the effective GTK_STATE_FLAG_INSENSITIVE state will be returned, that is, also based on parent insensitivity, even if widget itself is sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口小部件状态作为标志集。值得一提的是，即使 widget 本身是敏感的，也将返回有效的 GTK_STATE_FLAG_INSENSITIVE 状态，也就是基于父级不敏感。

trans-unit.source: Returns the widget that is observed or NULL if none.

trans-unit.source: Returns the widget’s effective sensitivity, which means it is sensitive itself and also its parent widget is sensitive
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口小部件的有效灵敏度，这意味着它本身是敏感的，并且其父窗口小部件也是敏感的

trans-unit.source: Returns the widget’s sensitivity (in the sense of returning the value that has been set using gtk_widget_set_sensitive()).

trans-unit.source: Returns whether css_class is currently applied to widget .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether page is visible in its GtkStack. This is independent from the “visible” value of its GtkWidget.
