trans-unit.source: Returns whether self is currently showing the heading, i.e. the value of the “show-heading” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 是否当前正在显示标题，即“ show-heading”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether self is currently showing the names of the week days above the day numbers, i.e. the value of the “show-day-names” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 是否当前在日期编号上方显示星期几的名称，即“ show-day-names”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether self is showing week numbers right now, i.e. the value of the “show-week-numbers” property.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 是否正在立即显示星期数，即“ show-week-numbers”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether sibling is one of renderer ’s focus siblings (see gtk_cell_area_add_focus_sibling()).
trans-unit.target: 返回 sibling 是否是 renderer 的焦点同级之一（请参见 gtk_cell_area_add_focus_sibling() ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether widget should contribute to the measuring and allocation of its parent. This is FALSE for invisible children, but also for children that have their own surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回 widget 是否应有助于其父级的度量和分配。对于隐形儿童来说，这是 FALSE ，对于有自己表面的儿童来说，这是FALSE。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether window has an explicit window group.
trans-unit.target: 返回 window 是否具有显式窗口组。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether Emoji completion is enabled for this GtkText widget.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 GtkText widget 是否启用 Emoji 完成。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether a bevel will be drawn around the notebook pages. See gtk_notebook_set_show_border().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否在笔记本页面上绘制斜角。参见 gtk_notebook_set_show_border() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether a rubber banding operation is currently being done in tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回是否正在 tree_view 中进行橡皮筋操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether all columns of grid have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 返回 grid 所有列是否具有相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether all header columns are clickable.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有标题栏是否可点击。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether all rows of grid have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 返回 grid 所有行是否具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether an embedded underline in the button label indicates a mnemonic. See gtk_button_set_use_underline().
trans-unit.target: 返回按钮标签中嵌入的下划线是否表示助记符。参见 gtk_button_set_use_underline() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether an embedded underline in the expander label indicates a mnemonic. See gtk_expander_set_use_underline().
trans-unit.target: 返回扩展器标签中嵌入的下划线是否指示助记符。参见 gtk_expander_set_use_underline() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether an embedded underline in the label indicates a mnemonic. See gtk_label_set_use_underline().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签中嵌入的下划线是否指示助记符。参见 gtk_label_set_use_underline() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether an embedded underline in the text indicates a mnemonic. See gtk_menu_button_set_use_underline().
trans-unit.target: 返回文本中嵌入的下划线是否表示助记符。参见 gtk_menu_button_set_use_underline() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether children activate on single clicks.
trans-unit.target: 返回单次点击时是否激活儿童。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether columns are reorderable.
trans-unit.target: 返回列是否可以重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether fixed height mode is turned on for tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回是否为 tree_view 打开了固定高度模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether hover expansion mode is turned on for tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回是否为 tree_view 打开了悬停扩展模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether hover selection mode is turned on for tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回是否为 tree_view 启用了悬停选择模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether incremental filtering was enabled via gtk_filter_list_model_set_incremental().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否通过 gtk_filter_list_model_set_incremental() 启用了增量过滤。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether incremental sorting was enabled via gtk_sort_list_model_set_incremental().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否通过 gtk_sort_list_model_set_incremental() 启用了增量排序。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether items will be activated on single click and selected on hover.
trans-unit.target: 返回项目是否会在单次点击时激活和在悬停时选择。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether jobs will be tracked after printing. For details, see gtk_print_job_set_track_print_status().
trans-unit.target: 返回打印后是否将跟踪作业。有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_print_job_set_track_print_status() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether lines in the label are automatically wrapped. See gtk_label_set_wrap().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签中的行是否自动换行。参见 gtk_label_set_wrap() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether non-numeric text can be typed into the spin button. See gtk_spin_button_set_numeric().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否可以在旋转按钮中键入非数字文本。参见 gtk_spin_button_set_numeric() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not expanders are drawn in tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回是否在 tree_view 中绘制扩展器。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not the tree allows to start interactive searching by typing in text.
trans-unit.target: 返回该树是否允许通过输入文本开始交互式搜索。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether or not tree lines are drawn in tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 返回是否在 tree_view 中绘制树线。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether overlay scrolling is enabled for this scrolled window.
trans-unit.target: 返回该滚动窗口是否启用了叠加滚动。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether pressing the Tab key inserts a tab characters. gtk_text_view_set_accepts_tab().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否按Tab键插入制表符。 gtk_text_view_set_accepts_tab() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether rows activate on single clicks.
trans-unit.target: 返回单次点击时是否激活行。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether rows can be selected by dragging with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否可以用鼠标拖动选择行。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether rows will be activated on single click and selected on hover.
trans-unit.target: 返回单次点击时是否会激活行,悬停时是否会选择行。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether rubber banding is turned on for tree_view . If the selection mode is GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE, rubber banding will allow the user to select multiple rows by dragging the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否为 tree_view 打开了橡皮筋。如果选择模式为GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE，橡皮筋将允许用户通过拖动鼠标选择多行。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether search is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否启用搜索。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the GtkMountOperation is currently displaying a window.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkMountOperation当前是否正在显示窗口。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the GtkCellArea can respond to GtkCellAreaClass.activate(), usually this does not need to be implemented since the base class takes care of this however it can be enhanced if the GtkCellArea subclass can handle activation in other ways than activating its GtkCellRenderers.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkCellArea是否可以响应 GtkCellAreaClass.activate() ，通常不需要实现，因为基类会处理此问题，但是如果GtkCellArea子类可以通过除激活GtkCellRenderers之外的其他方式处理激活，则可以增强此功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the GtkStack is set up to interpolate between the sizes of children on page switch.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否将GtkStack设置为在页面切换子级的大小之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the GtkText will grow and shrink with the content.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkText是否随内容增长和缩小。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the GtkText will truncate multi-line text that is pasted into the widget
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkText是否将截断粘贴到小部件中的多行文本

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the GtkTextView is in overwrite mode or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回GtkTextView是否处于覆盖模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the child is currently selected in its GtkFlowBox container.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否 child 在其当前选择GtkFlowBox容器。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the stack is currently in a transition from one page to another.
trans-unit.target: 返回 stack 当前是否正在从一页过渡到另一页。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the area can do anything when activated, after applying new attributes to area .
trans-unit.target: 在将新属性应用于 area 后，返回激活后该区域是否可以执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the area has a depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回该区域是否有深度缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the area has a stencil buffer.
trans-unit.target: 返回该区域是否有钢网缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the area is in auto render mode or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回该区域是否处于自动渲染模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the audio for the stream is muted. See gtk_media_stream_set_muted() for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回流的音频是否被静音。有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_media_stream_set_muted() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the box is homogeneous (all children are the same size). See gtk_box_set_homogeneous().
trans-unit.target: 返回框是否均质（所有子级均相同）。参见 gtk_box_set_homogeneous() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the button has a frame.
trans-unit.target: 返回按钮是否有框架。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the cell renderer is activatable. See gtk_cell_renderer_toggle_set_activatable().
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格渲染器是否可激活。请参阅 gtk_cell_renderer_toggle_set_activatable() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the cell renderer is active. See gtk_cell_renderer_toggle_set_active().
trans-unit.target: 返回单元格渲染器是否处于活动状态。参见 gtk_cell_renderer_toggle_set_active() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the character at iter is within an editable region of text.
trans-unit.target: 返回 iter 的字符是否在文本的可编辑区域内。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the check button is in an inconsistent state.
trans-unit.target: 返回检查按钮是否处于不一致的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the child is currently revealed. See gtk_revealer_set_reveal_child().
trans-unit.target: 返回当前是否显示子项。参见 gtk_revealer_set_reveal_child() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the child is currently selected in its GtkListBox container.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前是否在其GtkListBox容器中选择了该子级。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the child is fully revealed, in other words whether the transition to the revealed state is completed.
trans-unit.target: 返回孩子是否完全显露,换句话说,是否完成了向显露状态的过渡。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the child's size request should override the set aspect ratio of the GtkAspectFrame.
trans-unit.target: 返回孩子的尺寸请求是否应覆盖GtkAspectFrame的设置纵横比。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the close button is shown.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否显示关闭按钮。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the color chooser shows the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 返回颜色选择器是否显示alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the combo box has an entry.
trans-unit.target: 返回组合框是否有条目。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the combo box sets the dropdown button sensitive or not when there are no items in the model.
trans-unit.target: 返回当模型中没有项目时,组合框是否设置下拉按钮敏感。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the common prefix of the possible completions should be automatically inserted in the entry.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否应在条目中自动插入可能完成的共同前缀。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the completion popup window will appear even if there is only a single match.
trans-unit.target: 返回即使只有一个匹配,是否会出现完成弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the completion popup window will be resized to the width of the entry.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否将完成弹出窗口调整为条目的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the completions should be presented in a popup window.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否应在弹出窗口中显示完成。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the current value is displayed as a string next to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前值是否以字符串形式显示在滑块旁边。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the dialog is modal. See gtk_native_dialog_set_modal().
trans-unit.target: 返回对话框是否为模式对话框。参见 gtk_native_dialog_set_modal() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the directory list is monitoring the directory for changes.
trans-unit.target: 返回目录列表是否在监控目录的变化。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the end child can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否可以调整端子的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the end child can be shrunk.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否可以缩小端子。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the entry is showing a clickable icon to reveal the contents of the entry in clear text.
trans-unit.target: 返回该条目是否显示了一个可点击的图标,以显示该条目的清晰文本内容。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the expander will resize the toplevel widget containing the expander upon resizing and collpasing.
trans-unit.target: Returns whether the expander will resize the toplevel widget containing the expander upon resize and collpasing.返回Expander是否会在调整大小和卷积时调整包含expander的toplevel widget的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the filter ignores case differences.
trans-unit.target: 返回过滤器是否忽略大小写差异。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the filter inverts the expression.
trans-unit.target: 返回过滤器是否反转表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the given page is included in the set of pages that have been selected for printing.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定页面是否包含在已选择打印的页面集中。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the icon appears sensitive or insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 返回图标是否显示为敏感或不敏感。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the icon is activatable.
trans-unit.target: 返回图标是否可激活。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the info bar is currently revealed.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前是否显示信息栏。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the label is currently in “editing mode”.
trans-unit.target: 返回标签当前是否处于“编辑模式”。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the label is in single line mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回标签是否处于单行模式。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the label’s text is interpreted as marked up with the Pango text markup language. See gtk_expander_set_use_markup().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签的文本是否被解释为使用Pango文本标记语言标记的文本。参见 gtk_expander_set_use_markup() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the label’s text is interpreted as marked up with the Pango text markup language. See gtk_label_set_use_markup().
trans-unit.target: 返回标签的文本是否被解释为使用Pango文本标记语言标记的文本。请参阅 gtk_label_set_use_markup() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the layout is set to be homogeneous.
trans-unit.target: 返回布局是否被设置为同质化。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the license text in about is automatically wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否在许可证文本 about 自动换行。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the list box should show separators between rows.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表框是否应该在行间显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the list should show separators between columns.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表是否应该在列间显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the list should show separators between rows.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表是否应该在行间显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the popover is modal.
trans-unit.target: 返回popover是否为模态。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the popover will close after a modal child is closed.
trans-unit.target: 返回弹出窗口是否会在模态子代关闭后关闭。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the preview entry is shown or not.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否显示预览条目。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer accepts input in PDF format.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机是否接受PDF格式的输入。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer accepts input in PostScript format.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机是否接受PostScript格式的输入。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer details are available.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机的详细信息是否可用。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer is accepting jobs
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机是否正在接受作业

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer is currently active (i.e. accepts new jobs).
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机当前是否处于活动状态(即接受新作业)。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer is currently paused. A paused printer still accepts jobs, but it is not printing them.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机当前是否暂停。暂停的打印机仍然接受作业,但不打印。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer is the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机是否为默认打印机。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the printer is virtual (i.e. does not represent actual printer hardware, but something like a CUPS class).
trans-unit.target: 返回打印机是否为虚拟打印机(即不代表实际的打印机硬件,而是类似CUPS类)。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the scale has an origin.
trans-unit.target: 返回刻度尺是否有原点。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the search mode is on or off.
trans-unit.target: 返回搜索模式是开启还是关闭。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the selected font is used in the label.
trans-unit.target: 返回标签中是否使用所选字体。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the selected size is used in the label.
trans-unit.target: 返回标签中是否使用所选尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the spin button’s value wraps around to the opposite limit when the upper or lower limit of the range is exceeded. See gtk_spin_button_set_wrap().
trans-unit.target: 返回超出范围上限或下限时旋转按钮的值是否回绕到相反的限制。参见 gtk_spin_button_set_wrap() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the spinner is spinning.
trans-unit.target: 返回旋转器是否在旋转。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the start child can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否可以调整起始子代的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the start child can be shrunk.
trans-unit.target: 返回起始子代是否可以缩小。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the stream has audio.
trans-unit.target: 返回该流是否有音频。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the stream has finished initializing and existence of audio and video is known.
trans-unit.target: 返回流是否已经完成初始化,是否存在音频和视频。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the stream has video.
trans-unit.target: 返回该流是否有视频。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the stream is set to loop. See gtk_media_stream_set_loop() for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回流是否设置为循环。有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_media_stream_set_loop() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the streams playback is finished.
trans-unit.target: 返回流的播放是否结束。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the tab contents can be detached from notebook .
trans-unit.target: 返回选项卡内容是否可以从 notebook 分离。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the tab label area has arrows for scrolling. See gtk_notebook_set_scrollable().
trans-unit.target: 返回选项卡标签区域是否具有用于滚动的箭头。请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_scrollable() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the tabs of the notebook are shown. See gtk_notebook_set_show_tabs().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否显示笔记本的选项卡。请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_show_tabs() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the values are corrected to the nearest step. See gtk_spin_button_set_snap_to_ticks().
trans-unit.target: 返回值是否已更正到最接近的步骤。参见 gtk_spin_button_set_snap_to_ticks() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the widget is currently being destroyed. This information can sometimes be used to avoid doing unnecessary work.
trans-unit.target: 返回小组件当前是否被销毁。此信息有时可用于避免做不必要的工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the widget should grab focus when it is clicked with the mouse. See gtk_widget_set_focus_on_click().
trans-unit.target: 返回用鼠标单击小部件时是否应获取焦点。请参阅 gtk_widget_set_focus_on_click() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the widget will display a standard close button.
trans-unit.target: 返回小组件是否会显示标准的关闭按钮。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window has been set to have a close button via gtk_window_set_deletable().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否通过 gtk_window_set_deletable() 将窗口设置为具有关闭按钮。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window has been set to have decorations such as a title bar via gtk_window_set_decorated().
trans-unit.target: 返回是否通过 gtk_window_set_decorated() 将窗口设置为具有标题栏之类的修饰。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window is modal. See gtk_window_set_modal().
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口是否为模态窗口。参见 gtk_window_set_modal() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window is part of the current active toplevel. (That is, the toplevel window receiving keystrokes.) The return value is TRUE if the window is active toplevel itself. You might use this function if you wanted to draw a widget differently in an active window from a widget in an inactive window.
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口是否为当前活动顶层的一部分。（即，顶层窗口接收击键。）如果窗口本身是活动的顶层，则返回值为 TRUE 。如果要在活动窗口中绘制窗口小部件与在非活动窗口中的窗口小部件绘制方式不同，则可以使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window will be destroyed with its transient parent. See gtk_window_set_destroy_with_parent().
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口是否将被其瞬时父对象销毁。参见 gtk_window_set_destroy_with_parent() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window will be hidden when the close button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 返回点击关闭按钮时是否会隐藏窗口。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the window will display a menubar for the app menu and menubar as needed.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this column is resizable.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether we’re rendering radio toggles rather than checkboxes.

trans-unit.source: Role name

trans-unit.source: Roles
trans-unit.target: Roles

trans-unit.source: Roles define the taxonomy and semantics of a UI control to any assistive technology application; for instance, a button will have a role of GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_BUTTON; an entry will have a role of GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_TEXTBOX; a toggle button will have a role of GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_CHECKBOX; etc.
trans-unit.target: 角色定义任何辅助技术应用程序的UI控件的分类法和语义；例如，一个按钮将具有 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_BUTTON 的作用；条目将具有 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_TEXTBOX 的角色；一个切换按钮将扮演 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_ROLE_CHECKBOX 的角色; 等等。

trans-unit.source: Rotates snapshot 's coordinate system by angle degrees around axis .
trans-unit.target: 围绕 axis 以 angle 旋转 snapshot 的坐标系。

trans-unit.source: Rotates @snapshot 's coordinate system by angle degrees in 2D space - or in 3D speak, rotates around the z axis.
trans-unit.target: 在2D空间中以 angle 旋转@ snapshot 的坐标系-或以3D角度旋转，围绕z轴旋转。

trans-unit.source: Row has children.
trans-unit.target: 行有孩子。

trans-unit.source: Runs a page setup dialog, letting the user modify the values from page_setup .

trans-unit.source: Runs a page setup dialog, letting the user modify the values from page_setup . If the user cancels the dialog, the returned GtkPageSetup is identical to the passed in page_setup , otherwise it contains the modifications done in the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 运行页面设置对话框，让用户修改 page_setup 中的值。如果用户取消对话框，则返回的GtkPageSetup与在 page_setup 中传递的相同，否则它将包含在对话框中所做的修改。

trans-unit.source: Runs the print operation, by first letting the user modify print settings in the print dialog, and then print the document.
trans-unit.target: 运行打印操作,首先让用户在打印对话框中修改打印设置,然后打印文档。

trans-unit.source: Same as GTK_BORDER_STYLE_NONE
trans-unit.target: 与 GTK_BORDER_STYLE_NONE 相同

trans-unit.source: Same as gtk_text_buffer_insert_range(), but does nothing if the insertion point isn’t editable. The default_editable parameter indicates whether the text is editable at iter if no tags enclosing iter affect editability. Typically the result of gtk_text_view_get_editable() is appropriate here.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_text_buffer_insert_range() 相同，但是如果插入点不可编辑，则不执行任何操作。该 default_editable 参数指示文本是否为可编辑的 iter 如果没有标签封装 iter 影响可编辑性。通常，这里的 gtk_text_view_get_editable() 的结果是合适的。

trans-unit.source: Same as gtk_text_buffer_insert_with_tags(), but allows you to pass in tag names instead of tag objects.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_text_buffer_insert_with_tags() 相同，但是允许您传递标签名称而不是标签对象。

trans-unit.source: Same as gtk_text_iter_forward_find_char(), but goes backward from iter .
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_text_iter_forward_find_char() 相同，但从 iter 后退。

trans-unit.source: Same as gtk_text_iter_forward_search(), but moves backward.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_text_iter_forward_search() 相同，但向后移动。

trans-unit.source: Same as gtk_text_iter_set_line_offset(), but works with a byte index. The given byte index must be at the start of a character, it can’t be in the middle of a UTF-8 encoded character.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_text_iter_set_line_offset() 相同，但是使用字节索引。给定的字节索引必须在字符的开头，不能在UTF-8编码字符的中间。

trans-unit.target: Saturation

trans-unit.source: Saves the context state, so temporary modifications done through gtk_style_context_add_class(), gtk_style_context_remove_class(), gtk_style_context_set_state(), etc. can quickly be reverted in one go through gtk_style_context_restore().
trans-unit.target: 保存 context 状态，通过这样做临时的修改 gtk_style_context_add_class() ， gtk_style_context_remove_class() ， gtk_style_context_set_state() 等可以迅速地在一个经过恢复 gtk_style_context_restore() 。

trans-unit.source: Scale delta, taking the initial state as 1:1
trans-unit.target: 比例三角,以初始状态为1:1。

trans-unit.target: 按给定因子缩放 snapshot 在二维空间中的坐标系。

trans-unit.source: Schedules this widget to be redrawn in paint phase of the current or the next frame. This means widget 's GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() implementation will be called.
trans-unit.target: 安排此小部件在当前或下一帧的绘制阶段重绘。这意味着将调用 widget 的GtkWidgetClass.snapshot（）实现。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling

trans-unit.source: Scrolling types.
trans-unit.target: 滚动类型:

trans-unit.source: Scrolls text_view so that iter is on the screen in the position indicated by xalign and yalign . An alignment of 0.0 indicates left or top, 1.0 indicates right or bottom, 0.5 means center. If use_align is FALSE, the text scrolls the minimal distance to get the mark onscreen, possibly not scrolling at all. The effective screen for purposes of this function is reduced by a margin of size within_margin .
trans-unit.target: 滚动 text_view ,以便 iter 在屏幕上由 xalign 和 yalign 指示的位置。对齐方式0.0表示左或上，1.0表示右或下，0.5表示中心。如果 use_align 为 FALSE ，则文本滚动最小距离以使标记显示在屏幕上，可能根本不滚动。出于此功能的目的，有效屏幕减少了 within_margin 大小的余量。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls text_view so that mark is on the screen in the position indicated by xalign and yalign . An alignment of 0.0 indicates left or top, 1.0 indicates right or bottom, 0.5 means center. If use_align is FALSE, the text scrolls the minimal distance to get the mark onscreen, possibly not scrolling at all. The effective screen for purposes of this function is reduced by a margin of size within_margin .
trans-unit.target: 滚动 text_view ,使 mark 在屏幕上位于 xalign 和 yalign 指示的位置。对齐方式0.0表示左或上，1.0表示右或下，0.5表示中心。如果 use_align 为 FALSE ，则文本滚动最小距离以使标记显示在屏幕上，可能根本不滚动。出于此功能的目的，有效屏幕减少了 within_margin 大小的余量。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls text_view the minimum distance such that mark is contained within the visible area of the widget.
trans-unit.target: 滚动 text_view 最短距离，以使 mark 包含在小部件的可见区域内。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the tree view such that the top-left corner of the visible area is tree_x , tree_y , where tree_x and tree_y are specified in tree coordinates. The tree_view must be realized before this function is called. If it isn't, you probably want to be using gtk_tree_view_scroll_to_cell().
trans-unit.target: 滚动树视图，以使可见区域的左上角为 tree_x ， tree_y ，其中 tree_x 和 tree_y 在树坐标中指定。该 tree_view 在调用此函数之前，必须实现。如果不是，则可能要使用 gtk_tree_view_scroll_to_cell() 。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to the next or previous section.
trans-unit.target: 滚动到下一节或上一节。

trans-unit.source: Search mode.
trans-unit.target: 搜索模式:

trans-unit.source: Search only text. A match may have paintables or child widgets mixed inside the matched range.
trans-unit.target: 只搜索文本。匹配的范围内可能会有可涂鸦或子部件混合。

trans-unit.source: Search only visible data. A search match may have invisible text interspersed.
trans-unit.target: 只搜索可见数据。搜索匹配中可能会有不可见的文字穿插其中。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a URI inside the recently used resources list, and returns a GtkRecentInfo containing information about the resource like its MIME type, or its display name.
trans-unit.target: 在最近使用的资源列表中搜索URI，并返回GtkRecentInfo，其中包含有关资源的信息，例如其MIME类型或其显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Searches forward for str . Any match is returned by setting match_start to the first character of the match and match_end to the first character after the match. The search will not continue past limit . Note that a search is a linear or O(n) operation, so you may wish to use limit to avoid locking up your UI on large buffers.
trans-unit.target: 向前搜索 str 。任何比赛是通过设置返回 match_start 的比赛和的第一个字符 match_end 到比赛结束后的第一个字符。搜索将不会继续超出 limit 。请注意，搜索是线性操作或O（n）操作，因此您可能希望使用 limit 来避免将UI锁定在大缓冲区上。

trans-unit.target: 可选标签允许用户从标签中选择文本,进行复制粘贴。

trans-unit.target: 对条目、文本视图和标签进行选择操作

trans-unit.source: Selections may happen asynchronously, so the only reliable way to find out when an item was selected is to listen to the signals that indicate selection.
trans-unit.target: 选择可能是异步发生的,所以唯一可靠的方法是监听指示选择的信号,以找出项目何时被选择。

trans-unit.source: Selectors
trans-unit.target: Selectors

trans-unit.source: Selectors work very similar to the way they do on the web.
trans-unit.target: 选择器的工作方式与网络上的工作方式非常相似。

trans-unit.source: Selects a custom item previously added with gtk_app_chooser_button_append_custom_item().
trans-unit.target: 选择先前添加了 gtk_app_chooser_button_append_custom_item() 的自定义项目。

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of characters in the label, if the label is selectable. See gtk_label_set_selectable(). If the label is not selectable, this function has no effect. If start_offset or end_offset are -1, then the end of the label will be substituted.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签是可选的，则选择标签中的字符范围。参见 gtk_label_set_selectable() 。如果无法选择标签，则此功能无效。如果 start_offset 或 end_offset 为-1，则标签的末尾将被替换。

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of nodes, determined by start_path and end_path inclusive. selection must be set to GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE mode.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个节点范围，该范围由 start_path 和 end_path (含）决定。 selection 必须设置为GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE模式。

trans-unit.source: Selects a region of text.
trans-unit.target: 选择文本的一个区域。

trans-unit.source: Selects a single child of box , if the selection mode allows it.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择模式允许，则选择 box 的单个子项。

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the text, if the label allows selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签允许选择,则选择全部文本。

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the widgets content.
trans-unit.target: 选择所有小组件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Selects all the icons. icon_view must has its selection mode set to GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE.
trans-unit.target: 选择所有图标。 icon_view 必须将其选择模式设置为GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE。

trans-unit.source: Selects all the nodes. selection must be set to GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE mode.
trans-unit.target: 选择所有节点。 selection 必须设置为GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE模式。

trans-unit.source: Selects an option in a 'choice' that has been added with gtk_file_chooser_add_choice(). For a boolean choice, the possible options are "true" and "false".
trans-unit.target: 在已添加 gtk_file_chooser_add_choice() 的“选择”中选择一个选项。对于布尔选择，可能的选项为“ true”和“ false”。

trans-unit.target: 选择AT-SPI可访问性后端。

trans-unit.target: 选择在网络浏览器中显示的Broadway后台。

trans-unit.target: 选择当前行。例如,通过三连击触发。

trans-unit.source: Selects the current word. It is triggered by a double-click for example.
trans-unit.target: 选择当前的单词。例如,双击就会触发。

trans-unit.target: 选择默认的OpenGL渲染器

trans-unit.target: 选择后备的Cairo渲染器

trans-unit.target: 选择本地的Quartz后台

trans-unit.source: Selects the native backend for Microsoft Windows
trans-unit.target: 选择Microsoft Windows的本地后台

trans-unit.source: Selects the native backend for connecting to X11 servers
trans-unit.target: 选择连接到X11服务器的本机后端。

trans-unit.target: 敏感但不可激活的图标可用于纯粹的信息目的。

trans-unit.target: 将 gesture 分成一个孤立的组。

trans-unit.target: 将页面设置序列化为a{sv}变体。

trans-unit.target: 服务器、客户端、窗口管理器

trans-unit.source: Set child as the current focus child of widget . The previous focus child will be unset.
trans-unit.target: 将 child 设置为 widget 的当前焦点子级。先前的焦点子对象将被取消设置。

trans-unit.source: Set a different root node, also known as a “virtual root”. You can pass in a GtkTreePath indicating the root node for the filter at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 设置另一个根节点，也称为“虚拟根”。您可以在构造时传入GtkTreePath，以指示过滤器的根节点。

trans-unit.source: Set a proper application ID
trans-unit.target: 设置一个合适的申请ID

trans-unit.source: Set on all ancestors of the focus widget, unlike CSS
trans-unit.target: 设置在焦点小组件的所有祖先上,与CSS不同。

trans-unit.source: Set on focus widget and all ancestors, unlike CSS
trans-unit.target: 设置在焦点小组件和所有祖先上,与CSS不同。

trans-unit.source: Set the GtkEntryBuffer object which holds the text for this widget.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkEntryBuffer对象，该对象保存此小部件的文本。

trans-unit.source: Set the “activatable” property for this row.
trans-unit.target: 为该行设置“可激活”属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the “selectable” property for this row.
trans-unit.target: 设置此行的“可选”属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the GtkStack associated with this GtkStackSidebar.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkStack与此相关GtkStackSidebar。

trans-unit.source: Set the “has-tooltip” property to TRUE, this will make GTK monitor the widget for motion and related events which are needed to determine when and where to show a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 将“ has-tooltip”属性设置为 TRUE ，这将使GTK监视小部件的运动和相关事件，这些运动和相关事件决定了何时以及何处显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Set the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_PROPERTY_SELECTED property on each tab, with the active tab getting the value TRUE, all others FALSE
trans-unit.target: 在每个选项卡上设置 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_PROPERTY_SELECTED 属性，活动选项卡的值为 TRUE ，其他所有选项均为 FALSE

trans-unit.source: Set the client window for the input context; this is the GtkWidget holding the input focus. This widget is used in order to correctly position status windows, and may also be used for purposes internal to the input method.
trans-unit.target: 为输入上下文设置客户端窗口；这是保存输入焦点的GtkWidget。该小部件用于正确定位状态窗口，也可以用于输入法内部的目的。

trans-unit.source: Set the column for the expander column.
trans-unit.target: 设置扩张器列的列。

trans-unit.source: Set the label widget for the expander. This is the widget that will appear embedded alongside the expander arrow.
trans-unit.target: 设置展开器的标签小部件。这是将出现在展开器箭头旁边嵌入的小部件。

trans-unit.source: Set the new position of the fill level indicator.
trans-unit.target: 设置填充水平指示器的新位置。

trans-unit.source: Set the precision to be displayed by spin_button . Up to 20 digit precision is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 设置 spin_button 显示的精度。最高允许20位数字的精度。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to TRUE to register with the session manager. This will make GTK+ track the session state (such as the “screensaver-active” property).
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为 TRUE 即可向会话管理器注册。这将使GTK +跟踪会话状态（例如“ screensaver-active”属性）。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to TRUE to skip the palette in the dialog and go directly to the color editor.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为 TRUE 可跳过对话框中的调色板并直接转到颜色编辑器。

trans-unit.source: Set this to NULL to make the group always visible.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 NULL 可使该组始终可见。

trans-unit.source: Set this to NULL to show all groups.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 NULL 可显示所有组。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE if the desktop environment is displaying the app menu, FALSE if the app should display it itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果桌面环境显示应用菜单,则设置为TRUE,如果应用本身应该显示,则设置为FALSE。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE if the desktop environment is displaying the desktop folder, FALSE if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果桌面环境显示桌面文件夹则设置为TRUE,如果不显示则设置为FALSE。

trans-unit.source: Set to TRUE if the desktop environment is displaying the menubar, FALSE if the app should display it itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果桌面环境显示menubar,则设置为TRUE,如果应用本身应该显示menubar,则设置为FALSE。

trans-unit.source: Set to the corresponding coordinates in target 's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 在 target 的坐标系中设置为相应的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Set to the first value in set .
trans-unit.target: 设置在第一个值 set 。

trans-unit.source: Set to the found value in set .
trans-unit.target: 设置在发现价值 set 。

trans-unit.source: Set to the last value in set .
trans-unit.target: 设置在最后一个值 set 。

trans-unit.source: Set to the next value.
trans-unit.target: 设置为下一个值。

trans-unit.source: Set to the previous value.
trans-unit.target: 设置为之前的值。

trans-unit.source: Set unless the stream is known to not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 设置,除非已知该流不支持寻找。

trans-unit.source: Set up the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_RELATION_CONTROLS relation between each tab and the GtkStackPage object for its page
trans-unit.target: 在每个选项卡与其页面的GtkStackPage对象之间设置 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_RELATION_CONTROLS 关系

trans-unit.source: Set when a widget is selected
trans-unit.target: 选择小组件时设置

trans-unit.source: Set when a widget is showing an error
trans-unit.target: 设置当小组件显示错误时

trans-unit.source: Set when playback has finished.
trans-unit.target: 回放结束后进行设置。

trans-unit.source: Set while a seek is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 在寻找过程中设置。

trans-unit.source: Sets (or unsets) the function used for filtering items.
trans-unit.target: 设置(或取消设置)用于过滤项目的功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets (or unsets) the function used for sorting items.
trans-unit.target: 设置(或取消设置)用于项目排序的功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets buffer as the buffer being displayed by text_view . The previous buffer displayed by the text view is unreferenced, and a reference is added to buffer . If you owned a reference to buffer before passing it to this function, you must remove that reference yourself; GtkTextView will not “adopt” it.
trans-unit.target: 设置 buffer 作为缓冲正在显示 text_view 。文本视图显示的前一个缓冲区是未引用的，并且已将引用添加到 buffer 。如果在将 buffer 传递给该函数之前拥有该缓冲区的引用，则必须自己删除该引用；否则，必须先删除该引用。GtkTextView不会“采用”它。

trans-unit.source: Sets child_iter to point to the row pointed to by filter_iter .
trans-unit.target: 将 child_iter 设置为指向 filter_iter 指向的行。

trans-unit.source: Sets child_iter to point to the row pointed to by sorted_iter .
trans-unit.target: 集 child_iter 以指向该行指向 sorted_iter 。

trans-unit.source: Sets column as the column where the interactive search code should search in for the current model.
trans-unit.target: 设置 column 为其中交互式搜索代码应该在当前模式搜索的列。

trans-unit.source: Sets column of the child_model to be the column where filter should look for visibility information. columns should be a column of type G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, where TRUE means that a row is visible, and FALSE if not.
trans-unit.target: 设置 column 的child_model的是列在那里 filter 应该找可见性信息。 columns 应为 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN 类型的列，其中 TRUE 表示可见行，否则为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Sets completion to be the auxiliary completion object to use with entry . All further configuration of the completion mechanism is done on completion using the GtkEntryCompletion API. Completion is disabled if completion is set to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 将 completion 设置为与 entry 一起使用的辅助完成对象。完成机制的所有其他配置都在 completion 使用GtkEntryCompletion API完成。如果 completion 设置为 NULL ,则禁用完成。

trans-unit.source: Sets file as the current filename for the file chooser, by changing to the file’s parent folder and actually selecting the file in list. If the chooser is in GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_SAVE mode, the file’s base name will also appear in the dialog’s file name entry.
trans-unit.target: 设置 file 作为当前文件名的文件选择器，通过改变该文件的父文件夹，实际上在选择列表中的文件。如果 chooser 处于 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_SAVE 模式，则文件的基本名称也将出现在对话框的文件名条目中。

trans-unit.source: Sets filter_iter to point to the row in filter that corresponds to the row pointed at by child_iter . If filter_iter was not set, FALSE is returned.
trans-unit.target: 设置 filter_iter 指向 filter 中与 child_iter 指向的行相对应的行。如果未设置 filter_iter ，则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Sets func to be called when a popup is about to be shown. func should use one of
trans-unit.target: 将 func 设置为将要显示弹出窗口时调用。 func 应该使用以下一种
